tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
*** ****** ** *** **** ****** * **** **** **** *** I started going to Dr. Tripat a year before I started planning a baby and it was the best choice I’ve ever made. 
Dr. Tripat's experience and methodical way of doing things makes her second to none. She is always so positive about everything (even if there is a problem) and as a patient that is an extremely re-assuring quality. She never passes on the stress of a situation to the patient and knows exactly how to deal with anything and everything. With Dr. Tripat there are no unnecessary problems and all genuine problems have a simple solution. Unlike most doctors today, Dr. Tripat will never make you do unnecessary tests or ultrasounds, unless they are really needed. Throughout my pregnancy I just had 3 ultrasounds and minimal number of routine blood tests (sugar, thyroid and other required tests). Dr. Tripat maybe arguably the busiest gynecologist in Delhi, however, she makes it a point to spend enough time with each and every patient. Dr. Tripat and Dr. Uma (Assistant Doctor) are also always available over the phone for urgent queries and help if needed.
I believe a gynecologist has to be friendly, approachable and mother-like and Dr. Tripat was more than all of that to me. I trusted her blindly and only did and did not do what she asked me to (I did not read google/BabyCenter or other apps to get answers to my questions).
I would recommend Dr.Tripat, no questions asked, to anyone. Thanks to Dr. Tripat, my pregnancy and delivery was extremely easy and one of the best experiences of my life.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We switched to Dr. Tripat midway in my pregnancy and it was the best decision. She is a very reassuring  person by nature and you will confident in her care. During lockdown, she arranged for me to be admitted one day before due date since the covid situation was quite bad all around. I had a traumatic birth which started as an induced labor and ended with c section due to obstructed delivery. Her team at la femme is par excellent. Despite the pain I was in the doctors and nurses did everything they could to make me comfortable, were always cued in, very prompt, understanding and very competent. I couldn't have been in better hands. Highly recommend her and her team of Dr. Uma and Dr. Bharti.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
*** ** *** **** ****** *** ***** **** **** *** *********. Mine was a complicated one but the doctor made me feel like everything is very normal. 
I met her before conception and her advice worked like a miracle. Although she is one of the busiest doctors in Delhi, she gives plenty of time and very calm & patient. I still remember her statement "Stress is for doctors to take, your job is to stay happy and relaxed" 
unlike other doctors, she would never ask for ultrasounds nad tests unless absolutely necessary. 
she treats you like our own family and somewhere in her personality there is a motherly persona which is also very prominent in her treatments and counsellings
I would highly recommend her!!

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr.tripat chaudhary hs been like a fairy god mother 2 me since my first visit 2 hr 27 yrs back!!!..she is an excellent doc..she hears ur ailment patiently...great agony aunt..n  a lovely human..I OWE A LOT 2 HER..MAY GOD BLESS HER N HER FAMILY  N KEEP HER ALWAYZ HAPPY!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
*** ** * *** *** *** after 3 miscarriages for no reason I went to her, she is so positive and gave me confidence that I am not sick, she is friendly and you don't feel worry with her, I got dengue in the 6th month of preganancy, she was so kind to keep me positive and get better. I am a mother of 3 year old. 
When it come to gynae visit I don't think for other name.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: *** ** ** ****** 12 years of marriage, unable to conceive and visiting numerous gynaes, all of whom suggested IVF or infertility, it was Dr TC  who ensured a regular conception and a healthy pregnancy and delivery. And it was like being with a favourite aunt or elder cousin, she restored my faith and confidence in myself and the medical profession. God bless her!

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: Despite big number of patients Doctor Tripat Choudhary as given good amount of time and attention and has given detailed suggestions. Doctor is kind and friendly. Having ultrasound specialist in the next room made it possible to do ultrasound right away and to get back to doctor in 30 min for commentaries. Also Doctor Tripat Choudhary works closely with ultrasound specialist and they discuss issues in details right away and one can be confident that ultrasound was most accurate.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Wait time,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: I booked the first appointment in order to beat traffic and pregnancy sickness. The clinic was locked, with no orderlies, there was no drinking water and no explanation by anyone about why the doctor was late for 2 hours. During my appointment I was never checked physically and I had to ask her for the same to make my visit worthwhile. The doctor was super unfriendly which made me very uncomfortable. On my way out the doctor pointed out that her staff doesn't like being asked about her schedule. I found this comment very unprofessional considering most of their clientele is either pregnant or with babies.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: Awesome experience.  Doctor was very patient in listening. She gave the correct guidance about my problem.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review: I have known Dr Tripat Chaudhary for the last 19 years now. I trust her with her friendly nature and her treatments more than anyone. She is fab and i would recommend her to all... Absolutely love her as a person and as my doctor
